issue.title: [Java] Port Jdbc and Avro adapter to new directory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6019](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6019). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in mail list, adapters are different from native reader.

This issue is used to track these issues:

i. create new “contrib” directory and move Jdbc/Avro adapter to it.

ii. provide more description.

iii. change orc readers structure to “converter"

cc [~emkornfield@gmail.com]
